<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <variables></variables>
  <block type="pxt-on-start" x="77" y="-445">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="NTCSenor_SET">
        <field name="B">NTC_B.B3380</field>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="device_forever" x="83" y="-346">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="device_show_number">
        <value name="number">
          <shadow type="math_number" id="Nv.|MT%RItHhY.6xNE;)">
            <field name="NUM">0</field>
          </shadow>
          <block type="NTCSenor_GET">
            <value name="adc">
              <shadow type="math_number" id="!oSb7]7O`Z6E4@+ss}4i">
                <field name="NUM">256</field>
              </shadow>
              <block type="device_get_analog_pin">
                <field name="name">AnalogPin.P0</field>
              </block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
